title: ECB, Cricket Ireland officials to land in Islamabad tonight
text:
The England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) and Cricket Ireland board officials will arrive in Islamabad tonight, sources close to the matter said on Monday.

The chief executive of Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB), Wasim Khan will formally receive the delegation at Islamabad airport.

According to the source, the chief executive of England cricket board Tom Harrison and Ireland Board Officials will be briefed about the security situation in the country by the Interior Ministry.

The England and Ireland cricket boards officials will also visit the British High Commission in Pakistan during their visit and watch the third T20 match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka in Lahore.
